summary:
Hummingbirds are small, colorful birds found mostly in Central and South America. They are known for their fast, flapping wings, which make a humming sound. There are many types of hummingbirds, and they come in different sizes, from the tiny bee hummingbird to the larger giant hummingbird. These birds love to eat flower nectar and insects.

Hummingbirds are special because they can fly quickly and change direction easily. They also have unique abilities, like seeing well and communicating with each other. Some can even migrate long distances, like the rufous hummingbird. Unfortunately, many hummingbird species are in danger of disappearing.
title: Hummingbird
